purpose: Provide an open tutorial for learning and experimenting with LangChain and LangGraph tools.
principle: Utilizes LangChain and LangGraph frameworks to demonstrate concepts through Jupyter Notebooks.
reusability: Offers tutorial notebooks that can be easily adapted or extended for various educational purposes.
limitations: Primarily focused on educational use; may not cover advanced production use cases or integrations.
name: LangChain-OpenTutorial
description: LangChain, LangGraph Open Tutorial for everyone!
highlight: Open tutorial platform for learning LangChain and LangGraph through interactive notebooks.
